pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easily Access and Maintain Time-Based Versioned Data (Slowly- Changing-Dimension) // A collection of functions that enable easy access and updating of a database of data over time. More specifically, the package facilitates type-2 history for data- warehouses and provides a number of Quality of life improvements for working on SQL databases with R. For reference see Ralph Kimball and Margy Ross (2013, ISBN 9781118530801).
